page.title: 11TOURISM IN DORNIE
page.content: Tourism is important because it sells the area and brings money in.It is an industry all on its own,working alongside fishing and crofting.If there was no tourism then there would be no hotels or bed and breakfast places.Tourists come for the beautiful scenery in the area.They come to climb,walk,fish and sail.Most tourists come from abroad-especially America and Australia but also France,Germany and England.The majority of tourists go to Kyle or Skye but stop in Dornie to see Eilean Donan Castle.South West Ross and Skye is the third largest tourist area in Scotland after Edinburgh and Inverness.The area needs tourists so they can go home to encourage their friends to come to visit this beautiful place.
